text: @rogerstrevor1 @MattHancock We are duty bound by what the law says. Where does it say in law I am duty bound to some bullshit app? And even their own Coronavirus Act 2020 which is law is a load of bullshit - I've read it and nothing more than a totally unnecessary 329 page piece of totalitarian toss.
